description: This file provides functions to extract and format version information from a given 'info' dictionary, handling different input formats for the version data.

methods.name: GetVersion(info)
methods.description: Extracts the version as a list of three integers from the provided info dictionary. Handles both list and string formats; defaults to [1, 0, 0] if version info is missing.

methods.name: GetVersionString(info)
methods.description: Returns the version as a dot-separated string by calling GetVersion and joining its output.
